\subsubsection{\-Detailed \-Description}
post process flags 

\-This define a structure that describe the post processing settings. \-For the best objective measure (using the \-P\-S\-N\-R metric) set post\-\_\-proc\-\_\-flag to \-V\-P8\-\_\-\-D\-E\-B\-L\-O\-C\-K and deblocking\-\_\-level to 1.
